html: Thirty years ago, the world did not need too much from me in terms of activism. Now we need all the activists in the world to do something, and still it may not be enough.
text: Thirty years ago, the world did not need too much from me in terms of activism. Now we need all the activists in the world to do something, and still it may not be enough.

html: Let's heal ourselves, and the world together. I am also young and upset about how the world is now. We've got to change it, and we will. Right?
text: Let's heal ourselves, and the world together. I am also young and upset about how the world is now. We've got to change it, and we will. Right?

html: Stay well, and heal yourself, your loved ones, and the world. We are together on this, I believe. It will make me so happy to know that you are with me on this. I love you! yoko
text: Stay well, and heal yourself, your loved ones, and the world. We are together on this, I believe. It will make me so happy to know that you are with me on this. I love you! yoko

html: Listen to our collective subconscious. What do you hear? Create a global peace town. Let’s have Love. Peace. No more violence, no wars.

html: Reimagining John Lennon’s Imagine album I got to audition this newly remixed album, including the "raw" tracks, stripped of reverberation, strings, and other stuff. John's naked vocals sounded amazing, he was in the room with me. #Johnlennon https://youtu.be/MKZ9AL5Onz8  via @YouTube
text: Reimagining John Lennon’s Imagine album I got to audition this newly remixed album, including the "raw" tracks, stripped of reverberation, strings, and other stuff. John's naked vocals sounded amazing, he was in the room with me. #Johnlennon https://youtu.be/MKZ9AL5Onz8  via @YouTube

html: The #UltimateImagine Elements Mix of 'How?' Previously buried in the original LP mix in mono, you can now hear 27 of New York's finest classical musicians (nicknamed 'The Flux Fiddlers' by @JohnLennon) play his beautiful string arrangements in 5.1 & Stereo http://imaginejohnyoko.com pic.twitter.com/rfXfZHfZlX
text:
The #UltimateImagine Elements Mix of 'How?'
Previously buried in the original LP mix in mono, you can now hear 27 of New York's finest classical musicians (nicknamed 'The Flux Fiddlers' by @JohnLennon) play his beautiful string arrangements in 5.1 & Stereo

html: "It is very important to have art which is living and changing. Every phase of life is beautiful; so is every phase of a painting." Yoko, 1966. html: IMAGINE Yoko: ‘Imagine’ is a complete vision. A succinct bible of truth. It will start to unfold as you believe in it. It’s rather personal, but I had a definite reason why I smiled at the end. http://imaginefilmtickets.com  #UltimateImaginepic.twitter.com/XMTPFptE8T
text:
IMAGINE

Yoko: ‘Imagine’ is a complete vision. A succinct bible of truth. It will start to unfold as you believe in it. It’s rather personal, but I had a definite reason why I smiled at the end.

 http://imaginefilmtickets.com 
#UltimateImaginepic.twitter.com/XMTPFptE8T

html: My favourite sports when I was a teenager were, like a good Asian kid, table tennis, and like a good 'Cisco kid, tap dancing.

text:

Yoko: Fred Astaire was so meticulous. He made us do five takes because he didn’t like the way he was moving. John just loved this kind of thing.

html: I looked horrible when I mistreated myself. I look great when I treat myself with love. So relax, you'll be alright.
text: I looked horrible when I mistreated myself. I look great when I treat myself with love. So relax, you'll be alright.

html: Express your true love to this beautiful woman called Earth. We have been so bad to her. She will accept your apology even when you don’t utter a word.
text: Express your true love to this beautiful woman called Earth. We have been so bad to her. She will accept your apology even when you don’t utter a word.

html: When more people get down to being truthful to themselves. The world will change immediately.
text: When more people get down to being truthful to themselves. The world will change immediately.

html: JEALOUS GUY Yoko: When John first said, ‘Let’s use a helicopter’, I – who was supposed to have sold out in a big way – thought, ‘Oh dear, aren’t we getting a bit Hollywood?’ The result was that beautiful scene in ‘Jealous Guy’. http://imaginefilmtickets.com  #UltimateImagine @yokoonopic.twitter.com/KP48dfTu3y
text:
JEALOUS GUY
Yoko: When John first said, ‘Let’s use a helicopter’, I – who was supposed to have sold out in a big way – thought, ‘Oh dear, aren’t we getting a bit Hollywood?’ The result was that beautiful scene in ‘Jealous Guy’.
 http://imaginefilmtickets.com 
#UltimateImagine @yokoonopic.twitter.com/KP48dfTu3y
